product_name: Grabber Biodegradable Hand Warmers - Package of 3
long_description: The Grabber Biodegradable hand warmers provide up to 10 hrs. of warmth on cold winter days, and they're made with natural ingredients and fabric pouches that biodegrade in soil within 2 - 3 years. To use, simply open a packet-contents are air-activated and provide heat for a total of 10 hrs.; slip the packets in your gloves or mittens. Hand warmers are made with nontoxic materials; ingredients include iron, water, cellulose, vermiculite, activated carbon and salt. Package includes three pairs of Grabber hand warmers; each warmer measures 3.5 x 2 x 0.25 in. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9. Please note: this package of three pairs of hand warmers counts as one for the 10% volume discount.
short_description: The Grabber Biodegradable hand warmers provide up to 10 hrs. of warmth on cold winter days, and they're made with natural ingredients and fabric pouches that biodegrade in soil within 2 - 3 years.
